website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for orphans and nursing mothers, as well as adults that have health issues. Probiotics make it easy for most kittens and cats to tolerate.
pros: Contains probiotics that make it easy for kittens and sensitive cats to digest
Formulated with colostrum and vital nutrients for young kittens as well as nursing mothers
cons: Doesn't dissolve easily, and tends to leave small particles that can clog kitten bottle nipples
Occasional packages with short sell-by dates noted

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, very effective
customer_reviews.text: Had a little kitten that was found in an elley, waaaaay too young for solid food. Poor little guy had his ribs, hip bones, and spine visible through his skin and had a terrible hacking cough. Milk showed up and he attacked that stuff with a vengance. Within 2 days he'd visibly put on weight and wasnt coughing so much, within 2 weeks he was a healthy kitten again. Pretty sure this stuff saved the little guy's life.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lapinski

customer_reviews.title: Happy kittens!
customer_reviews.text: I have bottle fed dozens of kittens and used various products. This product is very smooth and easy to mix. The leftovers stay well in the fridge until the next feeding and it isn't 'sticky' like other brands. **Poo talk** The kittens golden poops are not hard but not runny either, an easy to pass consistency. Another thing I noticed is that they go right to sleep after feeding. They aren't 'unsettled'. The formula seems to sit very well in their bellies and passes well, too. I purchased 2 more cans after my original purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Xorri

customer_reviews.title: Good for senior cats too
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat was having issues (possible cancer or IBD, vet visit) and was not eating well and losing weight. He has an appetite again now but this was a lifesaver for awhile where all he would ingest was this and another brand milk replacement. He ate it readily and seemed to enjoy it. I know there are adult versions but I feel the kitten replacement has more fat and calories.
customer_reviews.author: pattysue

customer_reviews.title: Cats accepted it well.
customer_reviews.text: I generally give my cats the KMR brand milk in a can but that has become difficult to get due to coronavirus. I decided to give this dry milk a try since it had a lot of good reviews. My cats have accepted it well after some initial hesitation. It does smell a little different to me and obviously tastes a little different to them, but they are cleaning it up well now with no stomach upset from the change. That's all I can ask, since I do have an old cat and a feral with 2 kittens who need the milk. Good substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Literary Omnivore

customer_reviews.title: The purchase of this particular milk replacement saved my kitten's lives.
customer_reviews.text: My newborn kittens would not eat anything no matter what I tried. The babies were severely malnourished. I looked at the reviews on Amazon concerning the milk replacement. The reviews were convincing. My purchase of this milk replacement for my kittens, Ming and Grace was the best thing I did for them. I believe my furry babies would have died had I not purchased this product. They began to eat and gain weight. I am so grateful I purchased this product. When I tried to reorder several other times it was not available on Amazon. I purchased the milk replacement other times from other places.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: just as good as the name brand
customer_reviews.text: we foster kittens for local animal shelter / humane society. and we tried the name brand (3 initials) Kitten Milk Replacement. the kittens (3, 2 girls 1 boy) did not seem to appear to have a preference and drank both without a fuss (but then a starving man will eat anything). they gained weight and were able to be weaned as if their own mother was present. with this one being a cheaper price we will stick with it. since from what we have been able to assess (not scientifically) this works just as good but cost less. am purchasing more as i write this review seeing as we just got another motherless kitten to foster.
customer_reviews.author: joe doughnut

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt sell it
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the stray cat I was feeding KMR would like this, but she didn't. I even mixed it with the KMR, but absolutely refused it. I don't like that this has BHA at all, but being the first ingredient makes it worse. I'm sure all of these formulas have preservatives of some kind, but being a lay person, I cant pronounce, much less understand the huge array of chemicals they use. I'm back to using KMR for this stray, and hoping the other strays or raccoons will finish up this stuff so it's not wasted. Maybe this will work fine for baby kittens, or cats that haven't tasted KMR first.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitten Milk Replacement on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a new kitten. This product does not give your kitten the "runny poo" that other kitten milk replacements seem to give. I have had to "mother" many kittens over the years and this is the first kitten milk replacement that was well accepted by the kittens and did not make me concerned about dehydration that could be caused by "runny poo". Dehydration is a big concern with kittens as they are so small and it does not take much for it to become a real issue with their health. It has all of the necessary vitamins, minerals and nutrients for healthy upbringing. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Kittens and momma cat loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Fed this to a stray momma cat and her 6 kittens. They have all thrived! Preffered this over other brands because animal and vegitable fat was first ingredients listed. Other brands listed water as first ingredient. Using this now to feed the feral kittens their flea medicine. Crush up the pills and put it in the milk mixture. Recommend this to all people who have cats/kittens of any age. I put about half a tsp on their dry food or mix a tsp in their wet food everyday. Don't have to be kittens to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: A+ kitten formula
customer_reviews.text: Best formula I've found for foster kittens. Compared to KMR (powder and premixed), this stuff just seems to be better tolerated. No upset tummy and they grow like weeds. I also mix with a little bit of dried pumpkin powder (sold for dogs but safe for cats) and there haven't been any problems with loose stools or constipation, which has been my biggest complaint about KMR. Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Kitty
customer_reviews.text: Kitten is growing fast and seems healthy. This is easy to mix, and you can use warm water to make up just enough to use for one feeding. That’s very handy when you have to feed the kitten before you prime yourself with coffee.
customer_reviews.author: LabLady

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Nursing Kittens
customer_reviews.text: We had a 2 week old kitten we rescued. We tried some brand name from tractor supply but it was so watery even following the direction and it always left powder chunks but this kind is amazing! She chugged it down without any problems and was always easy to mix! So much cheaper than the kind at the store too!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel D

customer_reviews.title: I'd definitely recommend to people trying to get older cats to eat ...
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat loves it and is sure to remind me that it's time for milk throughout the day. I'm not sure, but I think it is helping her gain back a little weight. I'd definitely recommend to people trying to get older cats to eat more.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly White

customer_reviews.title: KITTENS SAY.... "GOOD STUFF"
customer_reviews.text: My kittens tell me that this is 'GOOD STUFF and to keep it coming.' I hear em smacking their little lips with pleasure. I like it, because it mixes up SO EASILY.. No lumps and it stays lumpless🤗🐾☮️. This gets a rating of paws up and thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: julie c.

customer_reviews.title: No Luck
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't matter what I like if the cats wont touch it. 1 of my cats was sick and essentially stopped eating anything fo 3 days. Vet suggested pedialyte and the kitten formula to get her back on her feet. We battle with pedialyte but she finally started taking it but absolutely refused kitten formula. Tried eye dropper, mixing with food, mixing with water in a bowl. No luck. She's back to eating now, thank God!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer-

customer_reviews.title: Easy and kitten did well with it
customer_reviews.text: I way prefer this to the canned milk the vet had. Kitten preferred it too!
customer_reviews.author: Beepbeepinajeep

customer_reviews.title: Great product for feeding kittens
customer_reviews.text: Easily dissolved with few or no lumps. Kittens grew well, and I found this product to be far superior than others on the market. I have used other brands, but this one was easy to mix....and the kittens grew quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MaryT

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good about this product.The kittens love it and it straightened out their tummy issues in one feeding.
customer_reviews.author: debra mccracken

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it.
customer_reviews.text: As long as I used hot water and a wisk, the powder broke down to nice creamy supplement. Kitty was less than 1.5 lbs when we got her. She doubled in size in 2 weeks. Her coat is shiny. She's much more active and has tons of energy. I attribute this great improvement to the milk replacement. She was taken away from mom too soon. This stuff saved her.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Feral Momma Cat & Babies Love It
customer_reviews.text: Feral momma & fur babies love this replacement milk. My 2 indoor cats turned their fussy noses up at it. My county, Pinal in Arizona, has a great TNR free program, the idea being that you spay/neuter they will not be able to breed. Out of more than 20 kittens, I've been able to catch 10 but not the momma or daddy....and so it goes. This replacement milk is great for lactating mommas and will keep her healthy and her kittens too.
customer_reviews.author: A Constant Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Milk for Kittens I fostered
customer_reviews.text: I fostered 6 kittens from 4 weeks to 16 weeks. I used this milk supplement for 8 weeks. They truly grew from the good things in this milk. I could not be happier with the growth from this item. No Mom so we needed Milk!
customer_reviews.author: EMILY

customer_reviews.title: Healthy happy kittens
customer_reviews.text: I took 5 orphaned kittens under my wing and used kmr powder milk for the first couple weeks and decided to see what my other options were on Amazon when it was time to refill our kitten formula supply. I'm so glad I found this and decided to switch brands. They drank it right up and went from having nasty yellow liquid stool to little brown firm stools.
customer_reviews.author: Iwaslikewow1983

customer_reviews.title: Kittens smelling fishy? Try this!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! I was using Hertz kitten milk replacement for some orphaned kittens I found and it made the kittens smell fishy. I replaced it with this formula and the smell was gone as soon as it was out of their digestive system. They stopped smelling like fish and they event got healthier on it too. I will always recommend this brand! 💯
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Best KMR I Have Tried!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been raising kittens for many years and have tried many kmr's. I find this one works best for their tummies and mixes very easily. All kittens have solid stools, no diarrhea EVER with this brand. Everyone is growing healthy and happy. I will continue purchasing this brand as I like to keep kmr on hand for emergencies and also as a treat for the extra calories and nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: MCM

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product. My cat is really picky and didn't like it. I did as instructed and I felt this product is overrated. I would not recommend this to any new kitten owner. My kitten does not like this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Beltran

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and my kitten loved it. Helped him gain some weight and get the nutrients he needed
customer_reviews.author: Stacey W

customer_reviews.title: The best milk replacer
customer_reviews.text: After hand raising many tiny kittens, I like this milk replacer best. Kitten grew healthy and loved the milk. It was really nice that it dissolved easily, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picky kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to mix! Just shake it, no clumps or granules. He likes it much much better than the previous ones ive tried and thankfully no more runny poo! This will be my go to from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Kimski

customer_reviews.title: Great milk replacer.
customer_reviews.text: I foster kittens and this is my go to milk replacer. It mixes up well so no clumps in the formula and kittens seem to really enjoy it. I like that there are added probiotics too.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie

customer_reviews.title: My cats like this. kitten loves it more!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten actually loves this milk. It's the only thing I buy for him. Really good. And also is good for his stools as another brand performed bad and was watery. Nonetheless he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnieann Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Best kitten milk
customer_reviews.text: Persian kittens love this and no diarrhea. Do not buy PetLac it gave my previous litter diarrhea and died! Easy to mix and having probiotics is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzy

customer_reviews.title: So much cheaper than the pet store
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a small kitten. Saved a significant amount of money than buying in store. Still the same product. Kitten survived lol.
customer_reviews.author: Elva

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell, my kittens hate it
customer_reviews.text: My kittens are picky eaters but I also smelled the formula when mixed and I don't think I blame them. It really smells bad. Probably rancid. Not the best milk out there.
customer_reviews.author: Osaki

customer_reviews.title: great milk replacement for kittens
customer_reviews.text: My remaining neonatal kittens thrived on this after 3 didn't make it on KMR. Best formula! Stools were healthy and no milk allergy issues.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: It’s Great!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens seem to really like this formula! It has a strange smell (kind of sweet/metallic?) but it didn’t give my cats problems.
customer_reviews.author: PenName

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics included!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this formula already has probiotics in it. It mixes very easily with no clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves this. is good for kittens. Having that was a life saver for our kitten. Got rescued from mom very early. Works good Pet Ag with baby animal bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Denise  B.

customer_reviews.title: Fine powder
customer_reviews.text: I put this over my kittens dry cat food to add nutrition for them. They snarf down the food!!
customer_reviews.author: KS Cavegirl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! This made my kitten really sick! He has been barfing after eating this if he doesn't stop soon I will need to take him to the vet after hours on a weekend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: MY KITTENS HATE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens won't drink even a drop of it! They would spit it out or vomit even though they're starving!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This product mixes well and does not clump up like other suppliers
customer_reviews.author: One of the Seven Ks

customer_reviews.title: Abandoned kittens love it. Now they are older I mix it ...
customer_reviews.text: Abandoned kittens love it. Now they are older I mix it with soft food to introduce them to the next stage. They loved it normal and mixed with food. Started using it at 3 weeks old
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Salser

customer_reviews.title: My kitten didn't like!
customer_reviews.text: my kitten didn't seem to like this at all! I don't think it was the product, probably just my picky eater. It went to waste though!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: We got this milk for an abandoned week old kitten. We were using KMR milk but this is sitting on the kitten’s stomach much better. Highly recommend if you are having to bottle-feed young kittens. We will be purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mix and use.. does not come with scoop
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Achor

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works well. They where not so sure about it except the youngest but they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Alexandra Webb

customer_reviews.title: Helped my sick kitten.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten was suddenly having diarrhea, which worried me a lot. I switched him from KMR formula to this and it stopped immediately. He also seems to love the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Errin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kitten milk replacement especially since it has colostrum in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic kitten milk replacement especially since it has colostrum in it. Sorry it is not available would use it for all my bottle feeders if it was available.
customer_reviews.author: NN Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We were able to raise 5 healthy kittens with this formula!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loved it
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loved it the whole bottle is gone now she about to be 6 or 7 weeks time to start wet food according to vet
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Patton

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: I was using kmr before, and my kittens had diarrhea. However when I switched to nutri-vet, their stools became a little more firm (not perfect, but better). It smells less creamy than kmr, and a bit more like strawberry, but it worked for me and the little kittens! It is also more affordable, which is a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good product, arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in 2 days. This is a good quality product and kitty loves it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Sue

customer_reviews.title: Bugs!
customer_reviews.text: Bugs in it., it came sealed and I stored in fridge. Gross
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Cats hate it
customer_reviews.text: I was bottle feeding 3 different litters of kittens. Not one kitten out of 14 would take this. They fought and spit it out. So i tried giving it to a momma cat.. She didnt want it. I evennteied other cats. No one liked this formula.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as depicted in picture and description
customer_reviews.text: I needed a product that contained colostrum for newborn kittens so I ordered this because it said it contained colostrum. When I received my product it was not in the container shown, or as in description and did not contain colostrum.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Milk Replacement 4 my kitten
customer_reviews.text: My 6-week kitten loves it & therefore it was an easy feed for her. I'll definitely order again if the last can is finished. Thanks & expect my order in two months.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda S. Lema

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!! Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for this formula! WE at rescue really appreciate this. Little kittens have a really tough time of it without Mama. Sometimes we have to hand rear them, and this formula is a godsend!
customer_reviews.author: Khadija S. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Cat wouldn't drink it. Tried adding more water-less water- ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat wouldn't drink it. Tried adding more water-less water- wouldn't drink it. Plus it's difficult to mix it into the liquid. Had to discard it -expensive .
customer_reviews.author: hoopy53

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, will order again if need be.
customer_reviews.text: Shops very fast, mixes super easy and seems to be very easy on my kitten's tummy. I have ordered this product 3 times. Will order it again if I have to hand feed another kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara rr Kennington's

customer_reviews.title: My new kitty loved this formula
customer_reviews.text: My new kitty loved this formula! We found her in the warehouse so she was starving and super skinny. After she started drinking this, she grew so fast!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Glad that our cats love it
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several different products, but this one is simply the best so far. Our picky cats love it so we bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ky Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: The kitties didn't care for it! Although the mom did, but feeding 6 wasn't easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle babies did much better on this than KMR.
customer_reviews.text: Used KMR in the past, but switched to this after KMR had quality/contaminate issues. Liked this product a lot better than KMR and kittens seemed to do a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat put on a special diet this milk is the only milk she will drink to help her digestive system
customer_reviews.author: Charles Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Kitten's love it and I came with a spoon
customer_reviews.text: I'm grateful this brand of milk came with a measuring scoop
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Raised three kittens from one day old. It has good nutrition they need.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as the picture. Not happy. Can't even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Saved a life
customer_reviews.text: Found an abandoned kitten. Left it overnight the mother never returned. Purchased this with prime and we were able to recuse the 2 week old kitten and save his life. He now has a family with 2 little girls. This stuff is great
customer_reviews.author: Darren a young

customer_reviews.title: Saved our kitten
customer_reviews.text: Saved some sleep of some very tired couple trying to save an abandoned kitten that our Peek-a-Poo has adopted.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product kittens tolerate it well cleared up the diarrhea caused by the KMR
customer_reviews.author: S. Waite

customer_reviews.title: Nursing a Kitten
customer_reviews.text: My Kittens And Adult Cats Like This Milk Nursing A Kitten That Mother Stop Feeding Its Working .
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Banks

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good and my kitten likes it. I put freeze dried food together with milk to help little kitten to transfer kitten dry food
customer_reviews.author: Joey

product_meta.title: Nutri-Vet Milk Replacement For Kittens with Probiotics, 12-Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:6 OunceMilk Replacement Powder for kittens contains essential amounts of protein, fat and carbohydrates plus vitamins, minerals and amino acids that newborn kittens need. It is readily accepted by newborn kittens and produces excellent growth rates and weight gain. It can also be used to help meet the increased nutritional requirements during cats’ gestation or pregnancy or in convalescing or elderly felines.
feature_bullets: Can Also Be Used To Help Meet The Increased Nutritional Requirements During Cats' Pregnancy Or In Convalescing Or Elderly Felines
Colostrum, Is A Highly Concentrated Mixture Of Large Protein Antibody Molecules, Vitamins, Electrolytes, And Nutrients
Readily Accepted By Newborn Kittens And Produces Excellent Growth Rates And Weight Gain
